explains: v. 修改，修订；纠正，改正；改善（土壤）的结构（或肥力）；<古>修复；改过自新
wordGroup: make amends for 补偿；赔偿…损失

sentences.en: To forestall is better than to amend.; Prevention is better than cure.
sentences.cn: 与其补救于已然，不如防范于未然。

sentences.en: Actually, I need to amend this.
sentences.cn: 实际上，我需要稍做修改。

sentences.en: Congress may amend the proposed tax bill.
sentences.cn: 议会可能会修正提议的征税法。
